name: Kiki gameboy mockup
description:
I've been working on this little GameBoy mock-up based on an animation made by  brandonjamesgreer for a few weeks now, and I would like to share it with everyone, feel free to leave feedback, if anyone cares I might make into a full game at some point, made with Java.

I took  a few creative freedoms like the save system and menus, as well as the enemies,  things that weren't in the little animation made by Brandon.
